product_name: Aventura Sinclair Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Crafted from soft, eco-friendly slub jersey, the women's Aventura Sinclair Tank Top is casual and comfy, while a chic twist at the V-neckline makes it special enough for a night out on the town. Textured slub jersey is made from 60% organic cotton and 40% bamboo. Wide straps are bra-friendly. The Aventura Sinclair Tank Top features a body skimming fit. Machine washable. Closeout.
short_description: Crafted from soft, eco-friendly slub jersey, the women's Aventura Sinclair Tank Top is casual and comfy, while a chic twist at the V-neckline makes it special enough for a night out on the town.
